name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill chicken. Toss with lettuce, parmesan, croutons, and dressing.

name: Veggie Burrito Bowl
instructions: Cook rice. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Top with salsa and avocado.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Cook vegetables in beef broth. Serve with rice.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Add basil and olive oil. Serve with balsamic glaze.

name: Tuna Salad
instructions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, mustard, celery, and onion. Serve with bread.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Mix lettuce, tomatoes, onion, olive oil, and vinegar. Serve with bread.
